name: Kitsch Ice Roller for Face & Eye Puffiness, Cold Skin Care for Facial Lymphatic Drainage, Dark Circles & Migraine Relief, Self Tool for Wrinkles, Valentines Day Gifts for Women Face Massager (Pink)
about_this_item: COOLING FACIAL: This stainless steel face ice roller from kitsch will become your new favorite addition to your skin care routine. It provides much-needed relief from puffiness, sore muscles and headaches through a cold, soothing facial treatment that promotes blood circulation to your face & neck to keep you feeling young and healthy!

SOOTHES SKIN IRRITATION: If you’re looking to soothe irritated skin, look no further. Our ice roller for face helps skin irritation with face ice roller skin care and promotes blood circulation to reduce toxins. As a result, it soothes skin irritation, inflammation and redness resulting from breakouts, sunburn, hair removal or shaving.

AT-HOME SPA: Skip the expensive salons with our cold face roller, and give yourself a cooling ice facial in the comfort of your own home or on-the-go! Our women's facial ice roller massager can leave you feeling more beautiful than ever before while saving you time and money.

HIGH-QUALITY TOOL: Expertly crafted with high-quality surgical stainless steel, our ice skin roller for face & eye puffiness relief calms inflammation & increases blood circulation. Stainless steel stays cold for longer and promotes a youthful-looking complexion.

PERFECT GIFT: Our face depuffer reliever is the perfect mothers day gifts for mom. Each package includes 1 ergonomic & lightweight ice facial roller for face. Kitsch is a self-financed, woman owned company. All Kitsch products are designed with love in Los Angeles, California.

title: Best cold roller out there
content: This is a HOLY GRAIL facial tool. I keep this in the freezer and use it nightly. I gently roll it across my cheeks, chin and forehead as well as over my brows and eye lids. I do this once after moisturizer until it doesn’t  feel cold anymore, then again after facial oils and it is cold all over again. Some may complain about this becoming warm quickly, but to me it’s very impressive and lasts much longer than my rose quartz roller. The trick is to use it until it doesn’t feel cold anymore and then come back to it a few minutes later. I’ve repeated that process up to 3 times and I could have used it a 4th time as well. Very impressive!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2020

title: Verified Purchase
content: I cannot say enough about how impressed I am with this; it truly does work!! Mild wrinkle improvement and texture after a month of daily use and defiantly noticeable instantly in reducing puffiness around my eyes in the mornings.

title: Verified Purchase
content: Absolutely love this thing! I keep it in the freezer, and it’s my favorite go to facial tool. I use it after any sort of abrasive skin treatment, and just when my face needs a cool down. I live in Texas, and it’s been brutally hot this summer, and this thing has been a god send. Does it do what it says it does? I can’t say for sure, but it feels so refreshing, and I do feel like the bags under my eyes have gone down a bit after I hold the roller underneath them every time I use it. Overall, well worth a try, as it’s a relatively cheap beauty purchase.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2020

title: Refreshing and cooling
content: I absolutely loved using this roller! It was easy to use and after not getting much sleep the night before, it was really refreshing first thing in the morning! Only downside is it doesn’t come with a case/travel bag. So if I wanted to pack this with me, I wouldn’t be able to. I just used the box it cane with to store it in the freezer. 5 stars for sure if Kitsch includes a travel bag!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023

title: Feels amazing.
content: Ive had it for about 2 weeks now. I haven’t noticed anything different as far as puffiness or lack of fine lines. BUT nonetheless, it feels awesome and soothing. Some of the reviews say that it doesn't keep cool, but once you’ve used it for a while it will warm up for obvious reasons...🙄 Give it a few minutes and its ice cold again. It’s apart of my nightly routine now!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2023

title: Verified Purchase
content: I’ve used this product several times now and notice that it definitely helps temporarily relieve some of the puffiness around my eyes. It’s easy to use and actually feels really nice to use right now since it’s so hot outside. I haven’t been using it long enough to notice much difference in my skin but I have noticed that when I use this product at night with moisturizer my skin always looks fresh when I wake up the next day.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2023

title: Weird sticky residue
content: I bought this and it looked fine and clean when I first opened it. Used it for a couple of days and then this morning noticed some strange clear sticky residue seeping out the sides, have no idea what it is and now pretty disgusted and worried because I rolled it all over my face. Returning this right away! Saw a few other reviews that said there was a residue and they thought it was used. I don’t think it was used but I question what the heck is coming out of it. I thought perhaps it was some sort of residue inside the stainless steel roller in order for it to freeze properly but stainless steel should be able to freeze by itself without anything inside. And if I’m wrong, then fine, but this clearly is defective because that stuff should not be coming out. I pray that I don’t have any weird bad reaction on my face after using this thing not very happy highly doubt reviews will get read by the company though.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023

title: Verified Purchase
content: Helps so much with inflammation of the face and definitely better than using an ice cube.

title: Wish it stayed cold longer
content: If there’s one thing 2020 has taught me, it’s self care. This year has been awful, and the last months have been especially hard personally (my cat suddenly passed away). I wasn’t sleeping well and started noticing dark circles under my eyes. I found this kitsch ice roller and it has been great! I use it first thing in the morning to help de-puff my eyes and face, and it’s also just a nice way to feel refreshed.

title: Verified Purchase
content: I was skeptical about these cold rollers being effective, and after trying this stainless steel facial roller for my first facial roller, I'm hooked! The stainless steel definitely gets very cold in your freezer, so make sure to leave it out to defrost a bit as recommended before using it on your face. My favorite part of using these rollers is the cold really does help me de-puff my face and calm down my redness. I'd definitely recommend as part of your skincare routine.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2019

title: Great ice roller
content: I bought this because I usually use an ice cube to “ice” my face before my morning/night skincare routine. It’s amazing for your skin and boosts collagen! But the ice cubes melt and I use a paper towel. So when I found this I thought it would be great since the metal will freeze cold and I can save paper towels and ice haha. Well it works for what you want only it doesn’t stay that cold. I get a couple of rolls in and the metal immediately matches my skin temp. Great roller but for what I wanted it to be fully used for.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2020
